meanings.definition: The quality or state of being devoted.
meanings.sent1: Her devotednesses to her family are evident in the way she always puts their needs first.
meanings.sent2: The devotednesses of the volunteers to their cause was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent3: Despite his devotednesses to his favorite sports team, they never seem to win.
meanings.sent4: The devotednesses of the sun to the sky is unwavering, shining brightly every day.
meanings.sent5: The devotednesses of the dog to its owner was heartwarming, following them everywhere.

meanings.sent1: His devotednesses to his studies paid off when he graduated with top honors.
meanings.sent2: The devotednesses of the fans to the band was evident in their enthusiastic cheers.
meanings.sent3: The devotednesses of the cat to napping knows no bounds.
meanings.sent4: Her devotednesses to her craft was like a beacon of light in the industry.
meanings.sent5: The devotednesses of the tree to growing tall and strong was admirable.

meanings.definition: The loyalty or faithfulness of being devoted.
meanings.sent1: The devotednesses of the knight to his king was unwavering.
meanings.sent2: She showed her devotednesses to her best friend by always being there for her.
meanings.sent3: The devotednesses of the coffee lover to their morning brew is unmatched.
meanings.sent4: His devotednesses to his principles was like a rock in the storm.
meanings.sent5: The devotednesses of the moon to the night sky is a timeless dance.
